text: Paris is a hamlet belonging to the Lemvig Municipality, located in Jutland in Denmark. It has a population of 12 and eight or nine houses. Residents hold a local festival once a year. The hamlet was visited by comedian Jan Gintberg, who made fun of the inhabitants.Noter fra Paris, Danmark, Ekstrabladet, 2 May 2009 It is located from Lemvig on the road to Struer. Another village south of nearby Lemvig is named Rom after Rome.visitlemvig.dk visitlemvig.dk - Byerne ==References== Category:Villages in Denmark Category:Populated places in Central Denmark Region Category:Lemvig Municipality
title: Paris, Denmark
